name: Nuvoid
description:
Free-roam procedurally-generated space game. Design spacecrafts however you like, including the controls!

Gameplay:

Nuvoid is a free roam procedurally generated space game where you have the ability to design your spacecrafts however you like, including the controls!

Although still in development, Nuvoid will be story driven having the choice to complete missions and do quests, but at the same time nothing is stopping you from flying off into any direction to explore huge asteroids, discover long-abandoned space stations, fight other drones, and upgrade your ship!

Story:

Even with the extinction of the human race over 200 years ago, war rages on in the universe like nothing has changed. Long-abandoned factories remain operational, constructing fighter drones to continue the war effort. Immerse yourself in the chaotic galaxy by fighting, exploring, looting, and building your very own voxel-based ships completely from scratch.

Demo:

In the demo you will have the ability to construct your own ships, and use them to explore and fight in the endless universe! Tip: From the spawn point, if you fly towards any coloured star, you will encounter a boss to fight.

Share your ship:

I've made it as easy as possible to download/share your own custom built ships with everyone!

If you have anything you would like to see in the future, any questions, or if you would like to show off your own spacecrafts for everyone to download, make sure to check out the forums and leave a comment!
